thread.title: Podcast: ‘On Iowa’ previews Illinois, talks hoops media day
thread.title_full: Podcast: ‘On Iowa’ previews Illinois, talks hoops media day

title: Podcast: ‘On Iowa’ previews Illinois, talks hoops media day
text: By Scott Dochterman , The Gazette October 8, 2015 | 9:59 pm The "On Iowa" podcast with Marc Morehouse and Scott Dochterman previews the Hawkeyes’ game against the Fighting Illini and breaks down Iowa basketball media day. Marc and Scott also answer readers’ Twitter questions. Click below to listen, or find this podcast on iTunes , Stitcher , and TuneIn Your browser does not support the audio element. Your Next Articles
